content.description: Valerie’s eyes focus on her notebook when she is taking notes in class, and the image of her writing appears clear and distinct. When she looks up at the instructor standing in the distance, her eyes focus on her instructor.
content.question: Which of the following accurately depicts why this change in focus occurs at different distances?

choices.label: The accommodation processes of the lenses in Valerie’s eyes
Sensory interaction between vision and audition

content.answer: The accommodation processes of the lenses in Valerie’s eyes

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
